REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0944 reute u f BC-TAIHEI-KOGYO-ISSUES-4 03-05 0043

TEXT.TITLE: TAIHEI KOGYO ISSUES 40 MLN SFR FIVE YEAR NOTES
TEXT.BODY: Taihei Kogyo Co Ltd is launching 40 mln Swiss francs of five year notes with a 4-3/4 pct coupon and 100-1/4 issue price, lead manager Swiss Bank Corp said. Payment is due March 18. REUTER
